author: sky.cactus
content: At the least, you need second citizenship.  Hypothetically you can become stateless, but things are *incredibly* complicated to do that.

author: paulmillr
content: Yep, 2nd citizenship sounds like a plan.

author: sky.cactus
content: It is not cheap.  Even if you go the residency route, you have to find another country that will accept you, which usually means local employment, and then you need to go through whatever residency program they have.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you are self employed/digital nomad, things become much more expensive.
